instructions: Edit Activity As soon as you open the app you will be directed to the My Activity page. Click the orange circle with a plus sign at the bottom of the screen. Add Activities Click the Add Another Activity button. Choose Your Activity Pick the activity that you would like to convert to steps. The converted activities are based on your specific program. Contact your program admin if you would like more information. Done! You will see a conversion of your activity into steps. Make sure to save your converted activity! Image titled Add Photos to a Post on Facebook Step 10 5 Tap or click the Photo icon. It s the icon that looks like a camera in the text box. Image titled Add Photos to a Post on Facebook Step 11 6 Select a photo. On a smartphone or tablet: Tap the photo you want to upload, then tap Done at the top right corner of the screen.
